title: NFC Southern Discomfort
description:
Mina and Steven Ruiz preview the NFC South- how will Michael Thomas' injury impact the Saints' offense (2:42)? Will Kyle Pitts step into the A.J. Brown role in Arthur Smith's offense (21:30)? Will Sam Darnold take a Ryan Tannehill-esque jump now that he's gotten away from Adam Gase (38:08)? And what, if anything, could potentially derail the Bucs (57:20)?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
